channel.title: Pages on Bermos tech and thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Bermos tech and thoughts

item.title: About
item.description: Between growing up as a huge Star Trek fan and my mother doing her web publishing certifications my first foray into all thing IT began with me trying to make a website showcasing the many spaceships in Star Trek in a LCARS inspired presentation. Shortly after that I began to dream big and had set my mind that I wanted to programm a video game. So the next time my mom and I went to a book store I started looking and found what I needed.
